LanguageData.BathroomDoor.label: bathroom door
LanguageData.BathroomDoor.description:
A door designed to fit with bathroom blocks. Can be entirely functional or aesthetic depending on what mods are installed.
When you gotta go, you gotta go.
LanguageData.GlassAviaryDoor.label: glass door
LanguageData.GlassAviaryDoor.description: A door designed to fit with aviary domes, but can be used anywhere.
